sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"地区"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: districk, region, area, section, zone, belt, quarter, neighbourhood
means: district ： 多指由政府等机构出于行政管理等目的而明确划分的地区。
region ： 普通用词，常指地球上、大气中具有自然分界线的区域，特指按照气候、人体或其他特征鲜明、自成一体的地区。
area ： 普通用词，指整体中较大的，界线不分明的一部分。
section ： 普通用词，指城市、国家或天然界线形成的地区。
zone ： 科技用词，指圆形或弧形地带，尤指地图上按温度划分的五个地带。用作一般意义时，也可指具有某种特征的其它地区。
belt ： 从本义"带，带状物"引申而指任何广阔的长条地带，也可指种植某种作物的地区。
quarter ： 指城市里具有相同性质或独特风味的地区，比section范围小，但划分更精确。
neighbourhood ： 指比section的划定更清楚，范围更小。具体指城市中的住宅区，也可指附近一带。

word_mean: 带，区：一个封闭的地带或区域，可引伸为具有特征或边缘的任何区域

sentence.Network_en: The security zone was set up to prevent guerrilla infiltrations.
sentence.Network_cn: 设立了安全区以防止游击队员的渗入。

sentence.Network_en: They fell into that twilight zone between military personnel and civilian employees.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们成了军队人员与平民雇员之间身份界定不清的人。

sentence.Network_en: The area could be turned into a demilitarized zone.
sentence.Network_cn: 该地区可能会成为非军事区。

jx.jx_en_mean: (US informal)fall asleep or lose concentration or consciousness. zoned
jx.jx_cn_mean: (美，非正式)入睡；走神；失去意识

lj.lj_ly: I just zoned out for a moment.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from French, or from Latin zona 'girdle', from Greek zōnē

encyclopedia.content: 概述简介 ZONE是北海道札幌的演员培训学校 RUNTIME”下培训出来的4人组合，1997年结成，2001年出道的4人女子乐团，来自北海道，是索尼音乐唱片公司旗下事务所RUNTIME旗下艺人。2003年底有过一次人员更替，2005年中在日本武道馆解散。2011年8月由3名成员实现了重组，2011年底一人病退，现为二人组合活动至今。 ZONE作为21世纪初日本乐坛极具代表性的女子乐队，出现于SPEED解散后的一个女子组合空档期，凭借音乐性十足的表演和成员

entry.tran: （有某些特色或特点的）地区，地带，区域
entry.def: A zone  is an area that has particular features or characteristics.

example.ex: Many people have stayed behind in the potential war zone...
example.tran: 许多人留在了可能会沦为交战区的地方。

example.ex: The area has been declared a disaster zone.
example.tran: 这个地区已经被宣布为灾难地带。

entry.tran: 将…划为特殊区域;指定…为某项用途区域
entry.def: If an area of land is zoned, it is formally set aside for a particular purpose.

example.ex: The land was not zoned for commercial purposes...
example.tran: 这块地未划作商业用地。

example.ex: Most of the private land in the park wasn't zoned or protected in any way.
example.tran: 公园中的大多数私人土地并未进行任何专门规划或保护。

means.word_mean: 1. a circumscribed geographical region characterized by some distinctive features
2. any of the regions of the surface of the Earth loosely divided according to latitude or longitude
3. an area or region distinguished from adjacent parts by a distinctive feature or characteristic
1. regulate housing in; of certain areas of towns

auth_sentence.content: The timing resonates north of the Demilitarised Zone too.
auth_sentence.res_content: The timing resonates north of the Demilitarised Zone too.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The timing resonates north of the Demilitarised Zone too.

auth_sentence.content: Mr. Canada is president of the Harlem Children's Zone.
auth_sentence.res_content: Mr. Canada is president of the Harlem Children's Zone.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Mr. Canada is president of the Harlem Children's Zone.

auth_sentence.content: This former paradise is now known as the Exclusion Zone.
auth_sentence.res_content: This former paradise is now known as the Exclusion Zone.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This former paradise is now known as the Exclusion Zone.

means.word_mean: (划分出来的)地区, 区域, 地带

sentences.en: Do not enter the danger zone!
They zoned the house into sleeping, sitting and dining rooms.
sentences.cn: 他们将房子区分成卧室、客厅和餐厅。

sentences.en: This small town has been zoned as a shopping area.
sentences.cn: 这个小镇已划作商业区。

sentences.en: The whole hospital area has been zoned off until the infection is under control.
sentences.cn: 在这种传染病得到控制以前, 整个医院已同外界隔离。

jushi.english: Do not enter the danger zone!
These trees only grow in temperate zones.
jushi.chinese: 这些树只能生长在温带。

jushi.english: It's against the law to build factories in this residential zone.
jushi.chinese: 在这个居民区建工厂是违法的。
